memberships.description: Limited access to basic gym facilities, such as weights and cardio machines.
benefits: Limited access to machines and weights during specific hours (avoiding peak hours)
Ideal for people looking for an economical and flexible option
memberships.idealFor: People seeking an economical and flexible option

memberships.description: Includes full access to all gym areas and group classes.

memberships.description: Full access with exclusive services and greater comfort.
benefits: Access to all areas and classes without restrictions

Complimentary towels, premium hygiene products, and private lockers
Access to functional training rooms and group classes such as yoga, spinning, and pilates

memberships.idealFor: Clients who value comfort and exclusivity in their gym experience
